Title: WhiteBoard
Description:
*NittiTre WhiteBoard*

Windows application that functions as a whiteboard on top of the screen, allowing you to write and paint on top of other applications. 

*Features:*
* Five colors (rec, blue, green, black and white eraser)
* Variable opacity on board from opaque to barely visible
* Different sizes on WhiteBoard marker
* Context menu (right clik) for ease of access
* Onscreen controls in top left corner

*Keyboard shotcuts*
* Escape: end application
* Page up/down: Increase, decrease opacity
* Backspace: clear screen

Further features possible. Feel free to contribute. 

For more information and screenshots, see [url:http://www.nittitre.no/]
